attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MRfyzRI4xDVtEZxcNJ2_description
attribs.current: If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tyrannosaurus can't bite another target

attribs.name: npc_type
attribs.current: Medium humanoid (any race), Any Non-lawful Alignment

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MRg1AeAq1uVVFb9-Eam_description
attribs.current: The thug makes two melee attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MRg1AeBJ5NehH6Owuc4_description
attribs.current: The thug has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the thug's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

attribs.name: npc_type
attribs.current: Medium humanoid (any race), Any Non-good Alignment

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MRg1CoEW6ZA2k69XAHB_description
attribs.current: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MRg1CoEW6ZA2k69XAHE_description
attribs.current: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MRg1EeZBkezT2KArhXj_description
attribs.current: If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MRg1EeactHAGe74FEZ-_description
attribs.current: The mastiff has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MRg1tQdQcWRqllTxCx3_description
attribs.current: The ettercap makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MRg1tQdQcWRqllTxCx4_description
attribs.current: The target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MRg1tQewkq4T7zmzKrM_description
attribs.current: The creature is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained creature can make a DC 11 Strength check, escaping from the webbing on a success. The effect also ends if the webbing is destroyed. The webbing has AC 10, 5 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MRg1tQewkq4T7zmzKrN_description
attribs.current: The ettercap can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MRg1tQfWg5TV9kriZII_description
attribs.current: While in contact with a web, the ettercap knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-MRg1tQfWg5TV9kriZIJ_description
attribs.current: The ettercap ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-MRg1tQewkq4T7zmzKrM_attack_tohitrange
attribs.current: +4, Range 30/60 ft., one large or smaller creature
